H0.text: Which animal has the varieties Arctic, Bat-Eared and Fennec. Wolf

H1.text: Which animal has the varieties Arctic, Bat-Eared and Fennec. Jackal

H2.text: Which animal has the varieties Arctic, Bat-Eared and Fennec. Coyote

H3.text: Which animal has the varieties Arctic, Bat-Eared and Fennec. FOX

A4.text: The fox-like canids, which include the kit fox (Vulpes velox), red fox (Vulpes vulpes), Cape fox (Vulpes chama), Arctic fox (Vulpes lagopus), fennec fox (Vulpes zerda), and bat-eared fox (Otocyon megalotis).
